## ‚ú® Overview
* This project simulates the front-end of an educational platform I created, called SkillUp Academy. I designed the logo and Figma myself, drawing inspiration from Rocketseat.

* Loom: [Screen & Video Recording](https://www.loom.com/share/945202f8933f49bda55ca8f89a4c8820)

## ‚ú® Demo

<img align="center" height="590em" src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/57466696/392615156-5ed45239-dd9d-480a-a4a9-35dc2df4da58.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..F49eRCtQ6np3rE3oEaEEu87I7CjI082Ne8iQ00I2aZM"/>

## üò¢ Limitations
I tried to upload the videos, but it indicated that I didn't have access. As a workaround, I created the entire flow and added a mock so that I could continue with the platform's implementation. The project includes hooks, enums, reusable components, and other features.
